title: Hextech Keys
body: I have a question.. How do i earn hextech keys as im not getting any in the end of the games for 4 weeks?? Im not playing the same champion over and over.

replies.body: Oh that makes sense but also i get honored and my honor level doesnt go up..

To further specify, Hextech Key shards are no longer tied to winning games but instead are purely based on Honorable behavior. I took a look at your account; right now it seems your Honor level is too low to receive Hextech Key shards. But if you're focusing on staying positive in game, then that will shoot back up in no time and you'll start receiving rewards again.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

You earn key fragments like you earn other honor rewards. You will usually receive an honor reward 3-5 times a week if you actively play, and more often than not, I usually receive them upon logging in for the first time on the day I receive it. I don't think people who are dishonorable are eligible for these rewards.
